meanings.definition: To make something ready or prepared.
meanings.sent1: She is readying her backpack for school tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: The chef is readying the ingredients for the evening rush.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel is readying its stash of acorns for winter.
meanings.sent4: The gardener is readying the soil for planting new flowers.
meanings.sent5: The team is readying their strategy for the upcoming match.

meanings.definition: The act of preparing or getting ready.
meanings.sent1: The readying of the stage for the performance took hours.
meanings.sent2: His readying for the exam included studying late into the night.
meanings.sent3: The readying of the picnic basket was a comical sight with all the food spilling out.
meanings.sent4: The readying of the spaceship for launch was a meticulous process.
meanings.sent5: The readying of the troops before battle was a tense moment.
